SAMRAI::pdat::OuteredgeDataFactory

SAMRAI::pdat::OuteredgeDataFactory< TYPE > Class Template Reference

Class OuteredgeDataFactory<TYPE> is a factory class used to allocate new instances of OuteredgeData<TYPE> objects. It is a subclass of the patch data factory class and outeredge data is a subclass of patch data. Both the factory and data classes are templated on the type of the contained object (e.g., double or int). More...

Detailed Description

template<class TYPE>
class SAMRAI::pdat::OuteredgeDataFactory< TYPE >

Class OuteredgeDataFactory<TYPE> is a factory class used to allocate new instances of OuteredgeData<TYPE> objects. It is a subclass of the patch data factory class and outeredge data is a subclass of patch data. Both the factory and data classes are templated on the type of the contained object (e.g., double or int).

See also:
pdat::OuteredgeData
pdat::PatchDataFactory

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<class TYPE >
SAMRAI::pdat::OuteredgeDataFactory< TYPE >::OuteredgeDataFactory ( const tbox::Dimension &  dim,
int  depth 
) [inline]

The default constructor for the outeredge data factory class.

The depth (number of components) gives the default for all of the outeredge data objects created with this factory.

Precondition:
depth > 0

References TBOX_ASSERT.

Member Function Documentation

template<class TYPE >
boost::shared_ptr< hier::PatchDataFactory > SAMRAI::pdat::OuteredgeDataFactory< TYPE >::cloneFactory ( const hier::IntVector &  ghosts  )  [inline, virtual]

Abstract virtual function to clone a patch data factory.

This will return a new instantiation of the abstract factory with the same properties. The properties of the cloned factory can then be changed without modifying the original.

Parameters:
ghosts default ghost cell width for concrete classes created from the factory.
Precondition:
getDim() == ghosts.getDim()

Implements SAMRAI::hier::PatchDataFactory.

References SAMRAI::hier::IntVector::getDim(), and TBOX_ASSERT_OBJDIM_EQUALITY2.

template<class TYPE >
boost::shared_ptr< hier::PatchData > SAMRAI::pdat::OuteredgeDataFactory< TYPE >::allocate ( const hier::Patch &  patch  )  const [inline, virtual]

Virtual factory function to allocate a concrete outeredge data object.

The default information about the object (e.g., depth) is taken from the factory.

Precondition:
getDim() == patch.getDim()

Implements SAMRAI::hier::PatchDataFactory.

References SAMRAI::hier::Patch::getBox(), and TBOX_ASSERT_OBJDIM_EQUALITY2.

template<class TYPE >
boost::shared_ptr< hier::BoxGeometry > SAMRAI::pdat::OuteredgeDataFactory< TYPE >::getBoxGeometry ( const hier::Box &  box  )  const [inline, virtual]

Allocate the box geometry object associated with the patch data.

This information will be used in the computation of intersections and data dependencies between objects.

Precondition:
getDim() == box.getDim()

Implements SAMRAI::hier::PatchDataFactory.

References SAMRAI::hier::PatchDataFactory::getDim(), SAMRAI::hier::IntVector::getZero(), and TBOX_ASSERT_OBJDIM_EQUALITY2.

template<class TYPE >
int SAMRAI::pdat::OuteredgeDataFactory< TYPE >::getDepth (  )  const [inline]

Get the depth (number of components).

This is the depth that will be used in the instantiation of outeredge data objects.

template<class TYPE >
bool SAMRAI::pdat::OuteredgeDataFactory< TYPE >::fineBoundaryRepresentsVariable (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Return a boolean true value indicating that fine data for the outeredge quantity will take precedence on coarse-fine interfaces. See the OuteredgeVariable<TYPE> class header file for more information.

Implements SAMRAI::hier::PatchDataFactory.

template<class TYPE >
bool SAMRAI::pdat::OuteredgeDataFactory< TYPE >::dataLivesOnPatchBorder (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Return true since the outeredge data index space extends beyond the interior of patches. That is, outeredge data lives on patch borders.

Implements SAMRAI::hier::PatchDataFactory.

template<class TYPE >
bool SAMRAI::pdat::OuteredgeDataFactory< TYPE >::validCopyTo ( const boost::shared_ptr< hier::PatchDataFactory > &  dst_pdf  )  const [inline]

Return whether it is valid to copy this OuteredgeDataFactory to the supplied destination patch data factory. It will return true if dst_pdf is EdgeDataFactory or OuteredgeDataFactory, false otherwise.

Precondition:
getDim() == dst_pdf->getDim()
